trans-unit.source: Handles exceptions that occur when a workflow is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 工作流无效时发生的异常处理。

trans-unit.source: Two examples of workflow conditions that trigger exceptions are incorrect configuration and the use of object names that are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 两个示例触发异常的工作流条件是不正确的配置和使用不是有效的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref>类使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref> class with the specified invalid workflow exception description.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref>为具有指定的无效工作流异常描述的类。

trans-unit.source: A string description of the exception.
Create a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref> class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref>使用指定的序列化信息和流上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> ，其中包含有关所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream.
Create a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref> class with the specified invalid workflow exception description and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException"></xref>使用指定的无效工作流异常说明和内部异常的类。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
